item.title: Version 0.4.0 (alpha)
item.description:
Features

  • NDN-RTC v1.1.0
    •

    Bugfixes

  • NDN-RTC v1.1.0 bugfixes
  • Fixed false error notifications on startup (remote observer already started)
    •

    Known issues

  • Rebufferings
  • Corrupted video frames

item.title: Version 0.3.2 (alpha)
item.description: Incorporated NDN-RTC v1.0.1 with bundled audio. Now audio samples are stored in one segment unless it is fully packed. This version is NOT compatible with any previous versions of NdnCon as the underlying data packet packet format has changed to incorporate audio samples bundling.

item.title: Version 0.3.1 (alpha)
item.description:
The following dependent libraries are now delivered inside the app bundle:
  • libboost_regex-mt.dylib
  • libchrono-chat2013.0.dylib
  • libconference-discovery.0.dylib
  • libcrypto.1.0.0.dylib
  • libicudata.51.dylib
  • libicui18n.51.dylib
  • libicuuc.51.dylib
  • libndn-cpp.0.dylib
  • libndnrtc.0.dylib
  • libsqlite3.0.dylib
  • libz.1.dylib
    •

item.title: Version 0.3.0 (alpha)
item.description:
This release encorporates several stability fixes and working ChronoChat (by Zhehao Wang) version.

Bugfixes:

  • fixed misaligned text chat messages rendering
  • implemented proper NDN-CPP exceptions handling
  • added visual focus highlighting to the conversation info view
  • proper handling of NFD shut downs while app is running
  • fixed crash with opening statistcs window when there are no consumers in active conversation
  • added crypto library to the app bundle
  • numerous stability fixes
    •

item.title: Version 0.2.0 (alpha)
item.description:
Features:

  • conferences discovery
  • text chat (EXPERIMENTAL)
  • MacOS X 10.10 compatible
  • drag&drop users onto status view to start new conversation with them
  • drag&drop users onto ative conversation to start fetching from them
  • added estimated outgoing bitrate in statistics window
    •

    Bugfixes:

  • fixed random crash upon closing app during active conversation
  • fixed crash when switching quality
  • fixed blinking to black when running a conference for a long time
  • fixed rendering artifacts bug when resizing window
  • minor bugfixes
    •

item.title: Version 0.1.1 (alpha)
item.description:
Features:

  • integrated Sparkle framework for In-App updates
    •

    Bugfixes:

  • fixed crash upon pressing "End conversation" button
  • fixed stream selection bug: sometimes, selected stream was locked without allowing switches to another streams
    •

item.title: Version 0.1.0 (alpha)
item.description: Requirements: - MacOS X 10.9 or later - NFD or ndnd-tlv forwarder installed Features: - audio/video streams publishing - audio/video streams fetching - user list - user meta info fetching - current fetching statistics - publishing from any camera recognized by MacOS - publishing in several encoding rates simultaneously
